name: Moto Mountain Hill Road
description:
Moto Mountain Hill Road !!!
This scooter simulator game has many challenging game levels and will keep you entertained for many hours. The game graphics and world are absolute amazing and will definitely provide the ultimate scooter simulator feeling!
Get to do some moto driving but please be careful because mountain climber is not easy. These mountain roads are very difficult for doing some moto driving. It will become even more difficult when you have a hitchhiker on the back of your motorcycle.
Race on motorcycles through mountain roads, perform crazy stunts and try not to crash your bike. Climb the roads and complete dangerous tracks. Be the bike champion!
